name: Archer vs Barbarian - Two Round Battle
description: Round 1: Both teams order peasants to construct buildings. Round 2: Purchase units from completed buildings and fight. Only the archer and barbarian move to center - peasants continue their normal behavior.

instructions._comment: === ROUND 1: PLACEMENT PHASE - Order peasants to build ===
Left team orders a peasant to build Fletcher's Hall
Right team orders a peasant to build Barracks
Both teams submit - battle phase starts, peasants construct buildings
=== ROUND 1: BATTLE PHASE - Wait for construction ===
Wait for round 2 placement phase (buildings should be complete)
=== ROUND 2: PLACEMENT PHASE - Purchase units from buildings ===
Left team purchases an archer from their Fletcher's Hall
Right team purchases a barbarian from their Barracks
Only the archer and barbarian move toward center - peasants continue mining
Both teams submit placements - battle starts
=== ROUNDS 3-5: Auto-submit placements to continue battle ===
